mapper.update:
update event_sorce set
EVT_SRC_CODE = #{evtSrcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_SRC_NAME = #{evtSrcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_SRC_DESC = #{evtSrcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where EVT_SRC_ID = #{evtSrcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_SRC_ID, EVT_SRC_CODE, EVT_SRC_NAME, EVT_SRC_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REGION_ID, REMARK from event_sorce where EVT_SRC_ID = #{evtSrcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select EVT_SRC_ID, EVT_SRC_CODE, EVT_SRC_NAME, EVT_SRC_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REGION_ID, REMARK from event_sorce

select EVT_SRC_ID, EVT_SRC_CODE, EVT_SRC_NAME, EVT_SRC_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REGION_ID, REMARK from event_sorce 1!=2
AND EVT_SRC_CODE = #{evtSrcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND EVT_SRC_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{evtSrcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC
